title: At Sundance, 'Project Syria' Puts Viewers In Center Of Conflict
teaser: At the Sundance Film Festival, "Project Syria" places participants in Aleppo during a rocket blast and later in a Syrian refugee camp. NPR's Robert Siegel talks with project lead Nonny de la Pena.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
